sexes:
<biblical_sex> = { male female ambiguous }
<intersex> = { gynomorph andromorph intersex }
<herms> = (<biblical_sex> CROSS { _herm }) UNION { herm }
<sexes> = <biblical_sex>
	UNION <intersex>
	UNION <herms>
	UNION { ambiguous_gender }
	MINUS { ambiguous }

global export <sexes>
pairings:
import <sexes> from sexes
<sexes> = <sexes> UNION { ambiguous } MINUS { ambiguous_gender } <sex_slash_pairs> = <sexes> CROSS { / } CROSS <sexes>
<sex_penetration_pairs> = <sexes> CROSS { _penetrating_ } CROSS <sexes>
global export <sex_slash_pairs>
global export <sex_penetration_pairs>
